can i learn hindi
how to start?

I can help. I am a native speaker and work in a language technology lab
Thanks @vtamara !
For each one of the files there an issue must be created, for example "Translation to Hindi of getting-started.json"
See each directory, please.
Including a little more about issues.  Anyway please review the files that require translation at https://github.com/FreeCodeCamp/FreeCodeCamp/tree/staging/seed/challenges

Hi @Namit, I have added you to FCC TranslateHindi Channel.
